questions.question_text: What is a capability of node-level logging in Kubernetes?

choices.B: Output that is written to stdin is retrieved by using kubectl
choices.D: Using the local logging driver of Docker enables log persistence
choices.A: Using the Kubernetes JSON logging driver enables log persistence
choices.C: Output that is written to stderr is not logged or retrievable by using kubectl

discussion.content:
Kubernetes Node-Level Logging

 • Kubernetes Logging Architecture: Kubernetes relies on logging agents (often deployed as DaemonSets) to capture logs from nodes and containers.
 • JSON Logging Driver: Using a structured logging driver like JSON can help in standardizing log formats and facilitating easier log management and querying.
Could be: A

Selected Answer: B
The question asks which of the choices is a capability of Kubernetes.
B is a true statement and is related to Kubernetes.
I think A and C are false, and D sounds like a capability of Docker.

questions.question_text: Which Dockerfile yields the most predictable builds?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
In C, the image version is give and we just update and don't upgrade the system.

questions.question_text: What is the purpose of using sysprep when developing a Microsoft Windows-based golden image process?

choices.C: installs all the latest security patches and OS updates to the local machine
choices.D: writes the local hard drive image to an ISO file that can be deployed to another machine
choices.A: prepares a new host to accept a hard drive image built on another machine
choices.B: removes all host-specific information and components from the local machine

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Agree with B.

https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-hardware/manufacture/desktop/sysprep--system-preparation--overview?view=windows-11

questions.question_text:
An IT department needs to deploy a new application named ‘Entfin434772390’ across the entire enterprise. The deployment must gradually transfer user traffic from an on older and nearly identical version of the application named ‘Entfin02754932l’. Both versions of the application are running in the production environment.

Which release strategy should be used by the IT department?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
it's blue/green strategy when you are phasing the old version out while you are bringing a new version in

comments.content: The keyword here is gradual, so the answer is not blue-green

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Agree with the given result, B.
